name: working-hours-tracker
description: Working hours tracker with key highlights PPT export

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join('node_modules','pptxgenjs','dist','pptxgen.bundle.js');const dir='vendor';const dest=path.join(dir,'pptxgen.bundle.js');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.mkdirSync(dir,{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(src,dest);console.log('Copied pptxgen.bundle.js to vendor/');} else {console.warn('pptxgenjs bundle not found at',src);}"
